[1]--Pride and Progress [2]--The Right Stuff; San Francisco No. 51, 1/27
[1]--Pride and Progress [2]--The Right Stuff; San Francisco No. 51, 1/27

Pride and Progress: San Francisco1. With William Casey, Kory McCormack, and Cheryl Rosenthal2.Scientists have discovered AIDS drug AZT and vaccine3.Two men chained themselves to county building after supervisors refused to allocate $50,000 for AIDS services4.Insurance compoany, Blue Cross has reimbursed patient for experimental AIDS treatments5.Colorado law makers trying to pass law to quarantine, test, and trace people suspected of being infected with AIDS6.Sacramento, CA jury selection for a case where four defendents from The Citizens for Medical Justice blocked the entrance of the governsors office who refused to meet and sign law AB3407, which would help protect people sufferening from AIDS7.Wesley Johnson in Oregon prison was punished for kissing the hand of a visitorCOMMERCIAL:Special Valentines Message from GCN8.Behind the Scenes at GCN8.COMMERCIAL: Shari Belafonte: San Francisco AIDS Foundation9.News Week Magazine features a condom advertisement10.San Francisco Supervisor, Harry Britt address condom advertisments and talks about condoms and risk11.Great Britain Secretary of State was in San Franciso touring facilities with people with AIDS12.Nello Carlini interviews Tighe Foley from the Shanti Project13.San Francisco police department meets with the gay community to talk about safety in regards to socializing, Dianne Christianson from C.U.A.V. talks about safety when leaving bars14.Sonoma has included AIDS discrimination legislationCOMMERCIAL:Special Valentines Message from GCN15.COMMERCIAL: Mikhail Baryshnikov, Shanti ProjectCOMMERCIAL:San Francisco AIDS Foundation16. Dr. Nancy Shaw sues University of California because of denied tenure17.Sally Gearhart Commentary, discussion about the gym18.GCN Announces 1 Year Anniversary19.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1. With Danny Williams, talks about GCN's 1st AnniversaryCOMMERCIAL:Special Valentines Message2.This Week in Gay History with Jeff Bixby3.Footage of GCN 1 Year Anniversary Party featuring Tom Ammiano, Danny Williams, Laurie Bushman, and Mario Mondelli4. Interview with Mike Hippler from Bay Area Reporter (BAR)5.Ms. Leather San Francisco Footage6.Closing Credits
